interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Tara Stiles This is Yoga : 4 DVD Set : Complete Yoga Encyclopedia: Daily Yoga + Beginners Yoga + AM/PM Yoga + Complete Yoga Library for Everyone Review Date: 2013/04/18 Store: Tara Stiles (Actor), Darren Capik (Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen, Surround Sound', 'Contributor': 'Tara Stiles, Darren Capik', 'Number Of Discs': '4', 'Runtime': '5 hours and 53 minutes', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '8.5 x 5.5 x 5 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Director': 'Darren Capik', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen, Surround Sound', 'Run time': '5 hours and 53 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 7, 2012', 'Actors': 'Tara Stiles', 'Studio': 'Watch It Now Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '4'} Review Text: This is a great value and great series. I saw Tara on You Tube and loved her style.

All 4 of the DVD's are excellent. These are recorded in various venues. The atmospheres are minimalistic and there is no backgound music. Tara directs you through the poses in her earthy approach to yoga. She is beautiful, talented, and humble.

She studied ballet in her youth and it shows. She is so graceful. Thanks Tara for your beautiful Diva style of yoga!

She has a studio in NYC, if you live there or travel it would be fun to drop in for a class. She has lots of videos on You Tube, so check her out and get this DVD set if you like her style. Review Title: Tara is the Diva of earthbound yoga with minimal ego Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Fitness Orientation:** Strong interest in yoga and exercise, specifically favoring accessible and beginner-friendly formats.
- **Content Preference:** Engages with video-based instructional content, especially DVD series showcasing various yoga styles.
- **Instructor Admiration:** High regard for relatable, down-to-earth instructors with a humble approach; appreciates elegance and grace in teaching style.
- **Atmosphere Preference:** Enjoys minimalistic settings during workouts, preferring environments without distracting background music.
- **Media Consumption:** Actively engages with digital platforms like YouTube for supplementary yoga content and practices.
- **Valuation:** Seeks value in fitness purchases, correlating quality with the reputability and authenticity of the instructor.
- **Community Engagement:** Open to participating in yoga communities, such as attending live classes in studios, indicating a social aspect to fitness interests.

This user shows a balanced approach to fitness through yoga, favoring instructors who resonate on a personal level and prefer content that emphasizes simplicity and elegance.
